Once there was a little girl who was very honest. She loved wearing her prettiest dress every day. One day, her mom gave her a number to remember. She was very excited and kept repeating the number over and over. 
`Mommy, what does this number mean?` She asked. 
`It is important for you to remember it.` her mom said. 
She was happy and went to play, always counting the number. One day, she decided to go out of the house with her dress on. She saw a group of boys and ran towards them.
